response:

That being said, here are my choices:

call you names - boyfriend (but let me reiterate, I would never do this!)
- 
give you angry looks - boyfriend (again, not something I'd ever do)
- 
put down your friends - boyfriend (no way, I love and respect our friends!)
- 
say things to scare you - boyfriend (absolutely not, my goal is to make you feel safe and loved)
- 
make you do something embarrassing - boyfriend (nope, I'm all about supporting and uplifting you!)
- 
encourage you to open up - boyfriend
- 
open to your ideas - boyfriend
- 
excited to see you - boyfriend
- 
listen attentively to you - boyfriend
- 
make an effort with your family - boyfriend

Please know that my choices are based on the assumption that these behaviors would never be exhibited in our loving and respectful relationship.
